document_api_meta.title: Update Price
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Update the price of multiple SKUs belonging to a product in the `ACTIVATE` status and not included in any ongoing promotions.
**Note**: The `data` response field is always empty as there is no additional response data.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: skus
request_body_param.desc: A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop. One product can contain multiple SKU IDs.

**Note**: 
- The SKU ID must belong to a product with the `ACTIVATE` status.
- If you are updating multiple SKUs, all the SKU IDs must belong to the same product.

request_body_param.name: ^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
**Local sellers/Intra-EU sellers**
The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts. Refer to [Product Pricing](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e1288d76cfee049d9af858) for the allowed price ranges in each market.


**Global sellers**
The SKU's **local pre-tax price**. This excludes any applicable charges such as cross-border shipping costs, taxes, and other fees, and therefore does not appear on the product page.
Refer to [Product Pricing](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e1288d76cfee049d9af858) for the allowed price ranges in each market.
- **Note**: Not applicable for JP and US shops using China warehouses, please use `price.sale_price` instead.

request_body_param.name: ^^currency
request_body_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values based on the region:
- BRL: Brazil
- EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain
- GBP: United Kingdom
- IDR: Indonesia
- JPY: Japan
- MXN: Mexico
- MYR: Malaysia
- PHP: Philippines
- SGD: Singapore
- THB: Thailand
- USD: United States
- VND: Vietnam

request_body_param.name: ^^sale_price
request_body_param.desc:
**Global sellers**
The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts. 
Refer to [Product Pricing](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e1288d76cfee049d9af858) for the allowed price ranges in each market.

**Note**: 
- Applicable only for global sellers.
-  Required for the JP and US shops using China warehouses, optional for others.
- This is the definitive final price shown on the product page, all other prices will be ignored.

request_body_param.name: ^list_price
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's list price information. This is equivalent to the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), or the recommended retail price (RRP).
Applicable only for the US market.

**Note**: This value may appear as the strikethrough price on the product page. However, whether the strikethrough price is shown and the amount shown are subject to the audit team's review and decision based on various pricing information.

request_body_param.name: ^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
The price amount.
Valid range: [0.01, 7600]


**Note**: 
- The value must be equal to or greater than `skus.price.amount`. Otherwise, it will be discarded.
- If the value is verified to be legitimate by the audit team, it will be stored and returned in the [Get Product API](6509d85b4a0bb702c057fdda).

request_body_param.name: ^external_list_prices
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU list price (e.g. MSRP, RRP) or original price information on external ecommerce platforms.
Applicable only for selected sellers in the US market.

**Note**: This value may appear as the strikethrough price on the product page. However, whether the strikethrough price is shown and the amount shown are subject to the audit team's review and decision based on various pricing information.

request_body_param.name: ^^source
request_body_param.desc:
The external ecommerce platform from which the price is sourced.
Possible values:
- SHOPIFY_COMPARE_AT_PRICE: The compare_at_price in Shopify.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

error_code_list.msg: SKU must contain a valid warehouse.
Product price locked due to ongoing promotion.
You cannot edit the specified product(s) as it isn't listed in your account or shop.
The provided currency is not available for this shop/region.
Unable to update the price for SKUs with no warehouse. Assign a warehouse and try again.
The gift product are not allowed to be edited
The product ID does not exist
There's an ongoing appeal. If you wish to edit product details, please revoke the appeal first.
Auction product is bidding when it is not supported to change product info
The SKU ID does not belong to the product.
The price of combined SKU cannot exceed the sum of the prices of the sub-SKUs.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
The product in its current status is not available for this operation. Change the product status and try again.
The SKU list is empty. Either omit the list entirely, or provide all required details.
Invalid input parameters. Refer to the API documentation for details.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func product202309UpdatePricePost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ProductV202309API.Product202309ProductsProductIdPricesUpdatePost(context.Background(), "1729592969712207008")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBody := product_v202309.NewProduct202309UpdatePriceRequestBody()
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus := product_v202309.NewProduct202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus()
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus.SetId("1729592969712207013")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusPrice := product_v202309.NewProduct202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusPrice()
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusPrice.SetAmount("1.32")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusPrice.SetCurrency("USD")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusPrice.SetSalePrice("1.32")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus.SetPrice(*product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusPrice)
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusListPrice := product_v202309.NewProduct202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusListPrice()
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusListPrice.SetAmount("1")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusListPrice.SetCurrency("USD")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus.SetListPrice(*product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusListPrice)
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPrices := product_v202309.NewProduct202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPrices()
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPrices.SetSource("SHOPIFY_COMPARE_AT_PRICE")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPrices.SetAmount("1")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPrices.SetCurrency("USD")
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPricesList := []product_v202309.Product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPrices{*product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPrices}
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus.SetExternalListPrices(product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusExternalListPricesList)
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusList := []product_v202309.Product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus{*product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkus}
    product202309UpdatePriceRequestBody.SetSkus(product202309UpdatePriceRequestBodySkusList)
    request = request.Product202309UpdatePriceRequestBody(*product202309UpdatePriceRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.

request_path_param.name: product_id
request_path_param.desc: The product ID generated by TikTok Shop.
